about_me.des: I am an early adopter for Chinese internet, one of long-time silence of majority, a full-stack aged engineer and a fan of cool electronic stuff.

projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.

career.soulkey_des: I co-founded a startup - Soulkey Tech in May 2015, we are going to give choices to students, instead of leaving that to schools that have fixed pattern of teaching and fixed resources.
career.neusoft_des: In Neusoft, where I spent 12 years there,  I started to manage development teams as Project Manager/Project Director/Dept. Manager. And I started to use multiple programing languages to build system on different platforms.
career.msc_des: April 2004ï¼ŒI got my MSc degree in Univ of Bristol after spending 2 years studying Machine Learning and Data Mining in there
career.firstjob_des: I got a Job as Java developer in Shanghai and did quite a lot of demos
career.college_des: At July 2000,I graduated from Lanzhou Unvi.
